description: Defines the HtmlGenerator class with a static method to generate an HTML report visualizing file access, including embedded CSS and JavaScript for interactive features.

classes.name: HtmlGenerator
classes.description: A class providing static functionality to generate an HTML report for file access visualization.

methods.name: generate_html_report
methods.description: Creates an HTML report with embedded styles and scripts, visualizing a directory tree and search functionality.

methods.name: get_last_error
methods.description: Returns the last error message encountered during report generation.
